1093662946180292608.text: As a member of the Homeland Security Appropriations Conference Committee, I will continue to advocate for increased border security and ensure that we are doing everything in our power to address the humanitarian and security crisis that we are currently facing. https://t.co/qtfDULRFiR

1093662694790488064.text: Investing in smart, high tech resources will only improve the long-term oversight of who and what are coming through the border.

1093662443102822400.text: We need to provide more technology to be used along the border. We know that most of the drugs streaming into our country are coming through our ports of entry. It's time that we provide those checkpoints with innovative technology to decrease illegal flows of drugs & weapons.

1093661939832565762.text: With additional migrant caravans heading our way, we need more boots on the ground actively monitoring all suspicious activity. While at the border, I was taken aback by the professionalism & commitment of those already working to secure the border.

1093661688631566336.text: Our goal should be to improve the existing barriers, and implement new physical barriers where they are needed. https://t.co/kKIvVx6s2x

1093661436381868032.text: Where we already have walls, we've seen dramatic decreases in illegal border crossings. In both Yuma and San Diego, where walls have been built, illegal border crossings have dropped 95%, helping our CBP agents to focus their efforts on other parts of their enforcement strategy. https://t.co/XXu3QsZFcG
